# aw-button

A simple button with styles of Anywhere Design System applied.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                               | Type                                                                                                                           | Default                  |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------ |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Boolean to indicate if button is disabled | `boolean`                                                                                                                      | `false`                  |
| `id`       | `id`       | Optional ID to be attached on button      | `string`                                                                                                                       | `undefined`              |
| `label`    | `label`    | Text to show inside button                | `string`                                                                                                                       | `undefined`              |
| `mode`     | `mode`     | Mode of button (style)                    | `AwButtonMode.default \| AwButtonMode.outline`                                                                                 | `AwButtonMode.default`   |
| `status`   | `status`   | The status of button (color)              | `AwButtonStatus.danger \| AwButtonStatus.primary \| AwButtonStatus.secondary \| AwButtonStatus.success \| AwButtonStatus.warn` | `AwButtonStatus.primary` |
